room_title: Escape room "The Mission" by Xcape Adventures in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Mission RoomWe came her on our daughter's birthday. It was awesome. The staff was welcoming and friendly. The room set up was awesome. We highly recommend this event for the family or date night.

room_title: Escape room "The Mission" by Xcape Adventures in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My boyfriend and I went on a slow Monday night for date night and had an AMAZING experience! We did “The Mission” room. The room was challenging and exciting. The owner, Aubrey, was very welcoming and has done a tremendous job coming up with all of the rooms and puzzles to solve. We cannot wait to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Mission" by Xcape Adventures in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had a wonderful time here one evening with family and friends, it really probs your mind and brain. It makes you think ! And it's great for team building and communication. The eXcape room we did was called mission and it was so fun !! I highly recommend this place for anyone looking to have fun and test your communication skills !

room_title: Escape room "The Mission" by Xcape Adventures in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The Mission!My family and I came tonight and we loved the room setup, all the spacious and comfortable seating in the lobby. We had a lovely experience!! We will be going to visit another room soon.
